Reviews.Title: Excelent Product
Reviews.Author: Rene Maica
Reviews.Content: Product compact, very good performance and fast. The cellphone has a unique design, aluminum metal coverage in the back is tough, its touch screen is nice and tender. The Windows operating system has applications good, practical and useful. The software of the phone was faulty in the ignition, the seller was responsible for everything and sent me a refund for the technical service, very responsible and friendly. I'm happy with the phone and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good price , winphone
Reviews.Author: Luis Alfonso Rada
Reviews.Content: excelent phone with winphone 7.5 upgrade to 7.8.  good performance and and excelent camara..pross ,, SO, internal memory , camaracontra :  not have sd

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Guillermo Marmora
Reviews.Content: stable, easy to use, highly friendly interface, good integration to most common apps, hard to believe for a Win-based appliance.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: domingo
Reviews.Content: I bought 5 phones and they all work ok. I have no problem with the equipment and wine box as is as showed in the picture for sale. Comprare 15 more products. thanks

Reviews.Title: nice cell phone
Reviews.Author: eduardo cubillan
Reviews.Content: nice cell phone, its keep warm when is in use but its ok , nice camera, this cell phone can use wp 7.8

Reviews.Title: ATTENTION - DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE!!!
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: This phone has a factory defect that cannot be fixed, except by sending it back to LG repair.The memory of the phone doesn't work properly. And even though at the begining the phone will work perfectly, at some point the memory of your device will fail. Making the device unable to boot. if you notice that your phone starts to turn off by itself, then better backup all your information, because is about to fail for good. And you will not be able to recover your info.Had this phone for a few months and then I got the error. Don't bother trying to cool booting the device, it's a HARDWARE issue, so the only way to fix it is with a replacement.

Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Runs Windows Phone 7.5, 16GB Built in Memory
MAY BE CARRIER BRANDED BUT IS COMPLETELY UNLOCKED, INCLUDES: Phone, Travel Charger, USB Cable, Rechargeable Battery, Earpiece
